oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A superconvergent projection method for nonlinear compact operator equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GRAMMONT, L
KULKARNI, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: integral-equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a method based on projections for approximating fixed points of a compact nonlinear operator. Under the same assumptions as in the Galerkin method, the proposed solution is shown to converge faster than the Galerkin solution. To cite this article: L. Grammont, R. Kulkarni, C. R. Acad. Sci. Paris, Ser I 342 (2006). (c) 2005 Academie des sciences. Elsevier SAS. .
